name: Nike Fission EDT for Men, Green, 100ml
description:
Nike Fission for men is a perfume that brings a tinge of freshness in your routine
					
						 It is a spicy, fruity and floral scent with top notes of bergamot, cardamom, grapefruit, and pepper
					
						 Strong, yet refreshing, the perfume has nutmeg, elemi, and bamboo leaves at its heart
					
						 The base notes comprise of musk, vetiver and the essential woody accords to emphasise on power and confidence
